SEARCH
Package com.example.eventlottery.managers

Class LotteryManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.eventlottery.managers.LotteryManager
public class LotteryManager extends Object
Lottery manager - handles lottery logic for events Stores all lists (accepted, declined, retry, selected) directly in the 'events' collection.

  • Constructor Details

    • LotteryManager

      public LotteryManager()

  • Method Details

    • initializeLottery

      public void initializeLottery(String eventId, int sampleSize, LotteryManager.LotteryCallback callback)
      Fetches entrants from the event's waitlistUsers field, shuffles them, and selects winners. Saves the results back to the 'events' document.

    • drawReplacement

      public void drawReplacement(String eventId, LotteryManager.ReplacementCallback callback)
      Draws the next person from lotteryOrder ONLY IF they are in the 'retryEntrants' list. Skips users who did not opt-in to the retry pool.

    • acceptInvitation

      public void acceptInvitation(String eventId, String userId, LotteryManager.StatusCallback callback)
      Updates a user's status to "accepted" for a specific event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The unique ID of the event.
      userId - The ID of the user accepting the invitation.
      callback - Callback to confirm the update or report errors.

    • declineInvitation

      public void declineInvitation(String eventId, String userId, LotteryManager.StatusCallback callback)
      Updates a user's status to "declined" and automatically attempts to draw a replacement winner.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The unique ID of the event.
      userId - The ID of the user declining the invitation.
      callback - Callback to confirm the update and the result of the replacement draw.

    • updateUserStatus

      private void updateUserStatus(String eventId, String userId, String newStatus, LotteryManager.StatusCallback callback)
      Helper method to update the user's status in the Firestore "selected" map and move them to the appropriate list (accepted or declined).

    • joinRetryList

      public void joinRetryList(String eventId, String userId, LotteryManager.StatusCallback callback)
      Adds a user to the "retry" pool, indicating they wish to remain eligible for replacement draws.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The unique ID of the event.
      userId - The ID of the user joining the retry list.
      callback - Callback to confirm the action or report errors.
